front.title: Services Provided By Reliable Server Pooling

abstract.t: RSerPool [1] is a framework to provide highly available servicesbetween clients and servers. This is achieved by grouping serversinto pools, each with an identifier and pooling policy. Threeclasses of entities are defined: Pool Users (clients), Pool Elements(servers), and Name Servers.This memo defines the services provided by this framework to upperlayer protocols and applications for Pool Users and Pool Elements.It describes the service primitives that the framework provides anddescribes example scenarios.
